eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.api

Class StatisticsFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.api.StatisticsFetcher

  • public class StatisticsFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to fetch player statistics from Minecraft config files. Create an instance for a single player's stats or get global stats from static access.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
